questions: Tell me about the Game Code Iterator
What is your game code refiner project?
Explain the AI game dev tool you made
answer: Game Code Iterator is a Flask-based tool that improves game code using prompt-driven suggestions from local LLMs via Ollama. It lets devs add features like double-jump or physics using simple prompts.

questions: What is the mental health chatbot?
Tell me about your chatbot project
What kind of chatbot have you built?
answer: It's a hybrid chatbot built using rule-based, retrieval-based, and generative NLP models. It gives context-aware mental health support and uses LSTM to personalize responses.

questions: What is the Ishare smart cane?
How does your Raspberry Pi project work?
answer: The Ishare Smart Cane helps visually impaired users detect objects using YOLOv9 and depth sensors. It gives voice feedback and runs live on a Raspberry Pi, enhancing real-time spatial awareness.

questions: Tell me about the pattern lock cryptography project
What encryption project have you done?
How does your cryptographic system work?
answer: It's a matrix-based cryptography system I built in C++. It uses 10 different encryption patterns for added security and was featured in the Bennett University library.
